contents.text: Welcome to Prezi in San Francisco, where creating, giving, and tracking beautiful interactive presentations is as easy as one, two, three.
For account and billing inquiries, press 1.
For subscription and plan details, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our subscription team.

navigationGoals: Upgrade my subscription plan to the Team tier and get a summary of its benefits.
I want to switch my plan to the annual military discount subscription.
I want to review subscription tiers—Standard, Plus, Premium—and upgrade my account to enable API access.
I’d like to switch my Prezi plan to the yearly premium tier.
I want to switch my Prezi subscription to the academic plan with student pricing.

contents.text: For billing, invoices, and payment questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Obtain my most recent invoice and verify my last payment.
I need a detailed invoice for last month’s payment to submit for reimbursement.
Please send me PDF versions of my last three invoices and assist in tokenizing my new credit card for payments.
I need a copy of my last invoice and to update my payment method.
I need an itemized invoice for my recent Prezi payment to submit with my expense report.

contents.text: For technical support and troubleshooting, press 2.
For help creating or editing your Prezi presentations, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our presentation support specialists.

navigationGoals: Resolve a problem editing my presentation slides right now.
I need help editing my Prezi for an upcoming veteran support workshop.
I need support troubleshooting a rendering error when exporting my SVG-based animations in Prezi.
I’m having trouble editing the layout of my presentation and need step-by-step help.
I need help inserting and formatting mathematical equations in my Prezi slides.

contents.text: For assistance with sharing and collaboration features, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our collaboration support team.

navigationGoals: Enable team collaboration on my Prezi and set appropriate access permissions.
I want to set up shared access so my veteran team can collaborate on a presentation.
Help me configure permission scopes for team collaboration and resolve Git-like merge conflicts in shared presentations.
I want to invite someone to collaborate on my Prezi and set the proper sharing permissions.
I need to set up collaborative editing rights so my study group can work on my presentation.
